mapper.select: SELECT NO SCHEDULE_NO , BOARD_NO , TITLE , START_TIME , LOCATION FROM SCHEDULE WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE(NO, CLUB_NO, BOARD_NO, START_TIME, LOCATION, TITLE) VALUES (SEQ_SCHEDULE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{clubNo}, #{boardNo}, TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), #{location}, #{title})
